Title: A metric to detect fault-prone software modules using text filtering
Published: International Journal of Reliability and Safety
Elements_risk_assessment: The data used in the article.
UseOF-SZZ: They used the fault data collected by the SZZ algorithm
Summary: They conducted an experiment to show the effect of new metric. The result suggested that use of new metric as well as conventional metrics is effective for accuracy of fault-prone module prediction.
Outcome: An approach to detect fault-prone modules using the spam-filtering technique, using a new metric.
